mapper.select: select * from comment_db order by c_idx desc where c_ref = #{c_ref} and c_bor = #{c_ref}
select * from comment_db order by c_idx desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_db (c_idx, u_idx, c_con, c_dat, c_up, c_out, c_bor, c_ref) values (#{c_idx}, #{u_idx}, #{c_con}, now(), '0', '0', #{c_bor}, #{c_ref})
mapper.update: update comment_db set c_con = #{c_con}, c_up = '1' where c_idx = #{c_idx}
update comment_db set c_out = '1' where c_idx = #{c_idx}
